get_IC_link.en: Click here to get your InfoCard

user_IC_text.en: A service has requested you to authenticate yourself. Please click on the image below to start a session with an InfoCard.

help_text.en: Information Cards (aka InfoCard) is a web authentication technology. Contact with your services provider in order to configure your computer and give you and Information Card (identification virtual card).

getcardform_self_text.en: Please, enter a self issued InfoCard in order to link it with the managed one we are generating.

getcardform_finished_title.en: Congratulations, your Infocard was succesfully generated

getcardform_finished_text.en: Please follow the next link to get to the login page.
